Automated deployment pipelines, reducing manual workload by 30% and increasing operational efficiency.
Ensured seamless scaling and performance optimization of Amazon’s Just Walk Out technology for automated retail stores.
Troubleshot deployment and software issues, analyzing root causes and implementing solutions to maintain continuous uptime.
